question: ‘eBkray’ platform was recently launched by finance ministry. It is related to ________.
explanation: The Finance Ministry had recently launched “eBkray” an online auction platform to ensure transparency in the auctioning of banks’ assets. This platform is linked with the Indian Banks Auctions Mortgaged Properties Information (IBAPI) portal. It also provides navigational links to all PSB e-auction sites and information and comparison of properties that are up for e-auction.
